> "I got it. All right. Lord Elder, Kup, I want you to keep this channel op=
en to Hydras, as things unfold. He'll want to hear how the chase is going, =
and probably want to hear Night Shift's act against me. That should spark s=
ome curiosity among him or his comrades. With that said, it's go time."
>
>=
 They transform into SUV modes and drive outside where Night Shift now turn=
s from Autobot into Decepticon. The chase begins quickly and furiously arou=
nd the Ark, as Tucson tries to lure Night Shift away.
>
> " Chase me all yo=
u want, you're not getting your hands on the Matrix!"

Lord Elder nodded as=
 the two nearly twined Autobots, Tuscon and
Nightshift completed their plan=
s and were ready to put them into
action.

"I will stay here." he said, obv=
iously still not completely convinced
that this plan would work, but was ho=
peful none the less. "Be
careful." He said as he stood and altered the shie=
ld so that it would
burst open for Nightshift, as if he had just broken out=
 instead of him
being let out.

He glanced around for a moment as if he tho=
ught he heard something.

With a small shrug he brought the shield back to =
full strength and
resumed his seat to watch the battle unfold via sensors a=
nd cameras
from the Ark.

(TAG)

Preston
